channel.title: Apple Sports on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Apple Sports on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Apple Sports Gets Expanded Soccer Support, Rolls Out in Mexico
item.description: Apple today updated its Sports app with support for the FA Community Shield, the annual English football pre-season opener where the reigning champions of the Premier League take on the FA Cup winners
